charges.charge_description: 18:1028A.F FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS (AGGRAVATED IDENTITY THEFT)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 36 MONTHS, to run consecutively to the sentence in counts 2 through 4; Supervised Release: 1 YEAR, to run concurrently. On 10/28/2016, Imprisonment: Time served on Specification 2. Supervised release is hereby revoked. All open specifications are dismissed on the motion of the Government. Supervised Release: 2 years. Supervised release is reimposed. with the previous conditions of supervised release, plus the additional condition of three (3) months community confinement, at a place and date to be determined by the Probation Department. The community confinement shall be attentive to the defendant's medical condition.

charges.charge_description: 18:1029A.F PRODUCES/TRAFFICS IN COUNTERFEIT DEVICE (ACCESS DEVICE FRAUD)(2-4)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 36 MONTHS, to run consecutively to the sentence in counts 2 through 4; Supervised Release: 1 YEAR, to run concurrently. On 10/28/2016, Imprisonment: Time served on Specification 2. Supervised release is hereby revoked. All open specifications are dismissed on the motion of the Government. Supervised Release: 2 years. Supervised release is reimposed. with the previous conditions of supervised release, plus the additional condition of three (3) months community confinement, at a place and date to be determined by the Probation Department. The community confinement shall be attentive to the defendant's medical condition.
